<html><DIV>
<P>Hold it! How many characters is a person allowed. When I got a message saying I was now a member it said I could have as many characters as I could deal with, but the nbwrpg rules say only 16, but <A href="mailto:Zardus@...">Zardus@...</A> has 18 and <A href="mailto:Airly2000@...">Airly2000@...</A> has 21. Can somebody please clear this up for me?<BR><BR></P></DIV>

<DIV></DIV>>Winbdlord/Termitron: 
<DIV></DIV>> 
<DIV></DIV>>Two McGowan's blast hit Windlord and them hit in Windlord's shoulder. 
<DIV></DIV>>The pain was high, Windlord felt weakest every second. He saw Depp 
<DIV></DIV>>went towards him and aimed agaisnt his stomach, he covered it with a 
<DIV></DIV>>wing while he moved to a side. The Spear hit Widnlord's Wing in that 
<DIV></DIV>>way that it inserted in Windlord's wing, he couldn't fly and neither 
<DIV></DIV>>it couldn't use his feather missile, at least not with that wing. 
<DIV></DIV>>Windlord shot two feather missile, with one wing, one against McGowan 
<DIV></DIV>>and other to Depp. 
<DIV></DIV>> 
<DIV></DIV>>Termitron had a bad while with his enemies. he had received 1 shot 
<DIV></DIV>>from Barrymore, one from Alba, one of Stiller's arrows hit him in one 
<DIV></DIV>>of his legs, he had the good idea to land (that let him avoid Lee's 
<DIV></DIV>>fireball). He fired 5 times against Barrymore, 5 to Alba, 5 to Lee, 5 
<DIV></DIV>>to Stiller, and 5 against Depp. 
<DIV></DIV>> 
<DIV></DIV>>After that he fell on his back. He didn't move. 
<DIV></DIV>>
